hero_titre_principal: Laboratory of Computer Science and Smart Systems
hero_sous_titre: The LISI crosses computer science with other disciplines to innovate and respond to the scientific and social challenges of tomorrow.
utilisation_donnees_defaut: We use default data while loading personalized data.
message_directeur: Our laboratory embodies scientific excellence and technological innovation. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of knowledge while training the next generation of researchers. Our multidisciplinary approach enables us to tackle the complex challenges of our time with creativity and rigor.
mission_titre: At the heart of technological innovation
mission_description: LISI promotes innovative, interdisciplinary scientific research with a high socio-economic impact.
mission_texte_1: The Laboratory of Computer Science and Intelligent Systems (LISI) aims to promote high-level scientific research, supervise doctoral students, and actively contribute to research-based training.
mission_texte_2: LISI is distinguished by a multidisciplinary and strategic approach, combining scientific excellence and openness to current challenges.
pilier_valeur2_description: Supervising doctoral students and involvement in training.
actualites_description: Discover the latest news and advances from our laboratory.
domaines_description: Our teams work on cutting-edge fields combining fundamental research and practical applications.
domaines_texte_final: These areas of expertise allow us to contribute to major technological and scientific advances.
domaine_donnees_description: Processing and analysis of complex data
domaine_cognition_description: Intuitive interface between human and machine
